revised_title: A Detailed Account of a Severe Hailstorm in Lancashire
tldr: This letter from Mr. Halley describes a severe hailstorm that occurred in Lancashire, causing significant damage to property, livestock, and wildlife. The hailstones were unusually large and heavy, with some weighing up to half a pound. The storm also brought thunder and lightning, and its aftermath was marked by a widespread search for fallen birds and fish along the coast.
